devDependencies.@yarnpkg/sdks: Replace the <=2.x || ^3.0.0 restriction with the latest stable version once a stable 3.x release is out.
devDependencies.typescript: Restricted for compatibility with `eslint-plugin`; when upgrading both, run `yarn lint` to re-check.

resolutions.@vscode/vsce: Private patch for Yarn v3 compatibility. Keep in sync with the version of the `@vscode/vsce` dependency.

scripts.clean: yarn workspace extension clean && yarn workspace mdmonthly clean
scripts.compile: yarn workspace mdmonthly compile && yarn workspace extension compile
scripts.lint: yarn workspace mdmonthly lint && yarn workspace extension lint
scripts.package: yarn workspace mdmonthly compile && yarn workspace extension package
scripts.upgrade-all: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn upgrade-packages' && false
scripts.upgrade-packages: yarn up '**' '@types/node@<=16.x' '@types/vscode@=1.76' '@yarnpkg/sdks@<=2.x || ^3.0.0' 'env-paths@<=2.x' 'typescript@<=5.0.x' && yarn up -R '**' && yarn clean-install
scripts.upgrade-yarn-itself: printf >&2 '%s\n\t%s\n' 'Run the following command line manually:' 'yarn set version stable && yarn install && yarn clean-install' && false
